languages.text: {n}Караэль впивается в вас взглядом, в котором таится обещание боли и мук. Очевидно — своей насмешкой вы задели друкари за живое.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Караэль впивается в вас взглядом. Затем переводит его на Маражая.{/n} "Ты заключил союз с Черным сердцем?!"

languages.text: {n}Kharael fixes you with a stare that holds the promise of pain and torment. Your jeering has obviously struck a nerve.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Караэль впивается в вас взглядом, в котором таится обещание боли и мук. Очевидно — своей насмешкой вы задели друкари за живое.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Kharael fixes you with a stare that holds the promise of pain and torment. Your jeering obviously struck a nerve with the Drukhari.{/n}
{n}Kharael fixes you with a stare that holds the promise of pain and torment. Your jeering obviously struck a nerve with the Drukhari.{/n}
{n}Kharael fixes you with a stare that holds the promise of pain and torment. Your jeering has obviously struck a nerve.{/n}
{n}Kharael fixes you with a stare that holds the promise of pain and torment. Your jeering has obviously struck a nerve.{/n}
{n}Kharael fixes you with a stare that holds the promise of pain and torment. Your jeering has obviously struck a nerve.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Kharael fixiert dich mit einem Blick, in dem das Versprechen von Schmerz und Leid steckt. Dein Spott hat offenbar einen Nerv getroffen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Kharael fixes you with a stare that holds the promise of pain and torment. Your jeering has obviously struck a nerve.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Kharael fixiert dich mit einem Blick, in dem das Versprechen von Schmerz und Leid steckt. Dein Spott hat offenbar einen Nerv getroffen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}卡瑞尔凝视着你，眼神中满怀恶意，渴望折磨你。很显然，你的嘲笑刺痛了他。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Kharael fixes you with a stare that holds the promise of pain and torment. Your jeering has obviously struck a nerve.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}卡瑞尔凝视着你，眼神中满怀恶意，渴望折磨你。很显然，你的嘲笑刺痛了他。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les yeux de Kharael vous promettent douleur et tourment. Votre moquerie a visiblement touché un point sensible.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Kharael fixes you with a stare that holds the promise of pain and torment. Your jeering has obviously struck a nerve.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les yeux de Kharael vous promettent douleur et tourment. Votre moquerie a visiblement touché un point sensible.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Kharael te lanza una mirada que promete dolor y tortura. Tus burlas han dado en el clavo.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Kharael fixes you with a stare that holds the promise of pain and torment. Your jeering has obviously struck a nerve.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Kharael te lanza una mirada que promete dolor y tortura. Tus burlas han dado en el clavo.{/n}

languages.text: {n}カラエルは痛みと苦痛の可能性を秘めた視線であなたをじっと見据える。あなたのひやかしは明らかに痛いところを突いた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Kharael fixes you with a stare that holds the promise of pain and torment. Your jeering has obviously struck a nerve.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}カラエルは痛みと苦痛の可能性を秘めた視線であなたをじっと見据える。あなたのひやかしは明らかに痛いところを突いた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Kharael'in sana odaklanmış bakışları acı ve işkence vadediyor. Alayların bam teline basmış gibi görünüyor.{/n}
